attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a large amount of bullying in schools across this country. It affects the lives of children everywhere, harming their education, social skills and self-confidence. Many schools are too leniant with bullying. What the Prime Minister should do is create a law so all schools should have the same punishments for bullying. In addition, I believe CCTV should be put in every school to prevent bullying.
